title: Advanced AI Engineering
description: Cutting-edge AI topics: Large Language Models, Reinforcement Learning, and AI Deployment.

lessons.title: Large Language Models Deep Dive
lessons.explanation: Learn the architecture, training process, and fine-tuning of LLMs like GPT.
lessons.code_example:
from transformers import GPT2LMHeadModel, GPT2Tokenizer
model = GPT2LMHeadModel.from_pretrained('gpt2')
...
lessons.task: Fine-tune GPT-2 with a custom dataset.

lessons.title: AI Deployment at Scale
lessons.explanation: Serve AI models with low latency using FastAPI + GPUs.
lessons.code_example:
from fastapi import FastAPI
import torch
app = FastAPI()
lessons.task: Deploy a HuggingFace model to production.

title: Blockchain & Smart Contracts
description: Build secure smart contracts, explore DeFi, and create DApps.

title: Cybersecurity Pro Series
description: Ethical hacking, penetration testing, and zero-day exploit analysis.

title: Insider Dev Tips
description: Real industry tips that are never shared publicly.
